statements: DELETE FROM protected_areas WHERE area_name = 'National Park';
DELETE FROM protected_areas WHERE area_type = 'National Park' AND area_location ST_CONTAINS(ST_GEOMFROMTEXT('POLYGON((1 1, 4 1, 4 4, 1 4, 1 1))'), area_location);
DELETE FROM ParkRangers WHERE area_id = 3 AND hired_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM Coordinates WHERE area_id = 200 AND latitude < 40;
DELETE FROM protected_areas WHERE area_name = 'Forest Park';
DELETE FROM researchers WHERE researcher_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM species_habitats WHERE species_id = 1 AND habitat_id = 2;
DELETE FROM area_species WHERE area_id = 3 AND species_id = 4;
